test_description: Verify end-to-end flow from user request creation to technician resolution
preconditions: User logged in; Technician active; Service Center configured with coverage area
test_steps: 1. User submits request via Mobile App; 2. System auto-routes to Service Center based on Geo-fence; 3. Admin assigns Technician via Web Portal; 4. Technician receives push notification; 5. Technician updates status to 'On The Way'; 6. Technician marks as 'Resolved' with signature
expected_result: Request transitions through states: Requested -> Acknowledged -> Assigned -> In Progress -> Resolved; Notifications delivered at each step
test_data_needs: User Account; Technician Account; Service Center with Polygon; Product with Warranty
dependencies: Notification Service; Routing Engine; Mobile Sync
environment_requirements: Staging with Azure Service Bus and FCM mocks
success_criteria: Full workflow completes in < 5 mins; Data integrity across PostgreSQL and WatermelonDB
cleanup_requirements: Hard delete created service requests; Reset technician status
security_considerations: Verify RBAC enforcement at each step

test_description: Verify queued requests sync automatically when network is restored
business_risk: High - Data loss for field technicians
preconditions: Technician logged in; Device in Airplane Mode
test_steps: 1. Enable Airplane Mode; 2. Technician completes job and captures signature; 3. Verify 'Pending Sync' status in UI; 4. Disable Airplane Mode; 5. Verify background sync initiates
expected_result: Data persists locally; Sync triggers on network connect; Server receives data; UI updates to 'Synced'
success_criteria: Zero data loss; Sync completes within 30s of reconnection
accessibility_requirements: Offline banner visible to screen readers

test_description: Verify Brand Admin cannot access data from another Brand
preconditions: Two Brand Admin accounts (Brand A, Brand B); Product data for both
test_steps: 1. Authenticate as Brand A Admin; 2. Attempt to GET /api/v1/products with Brand B ID; 3. Attempt to GET /api/v1/analytics with Brand B ID
expected_result: API returns 403 Forbidden or filters results to return empty set for Brand B queries
